title: Bug 17894 - Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults
OB: When the 'Restore Defaults' option is selected, the Open Mode preference is not being reset as expected.
EB: After selecting 'Restore Defaults', the Open Mode preference should be reset to its default state.
SR: 1. Open the application settings. 2. Modify the Open Mode preference to a non-default value. 3. Navigate to the 'Restore Defaults' option. 4. Select 'Restore Defaults'. 5. Verify that the Open Mode preference is reset to its default value.
